00037 TBTrackRawCheck::TBTrackRawCheck() :
00038   TBTrackBaseProcessor("TBTrackRawCheck") {
00039 
00040   _description = "TBTrackRawCheck" ;
00041 
00042   _cern=true;
00043 }
00044 
00045 void TBTrackRawCheck::initHists(bool real) {
00046 
00047   std::string sxy[2]={"TDC0","TDC1"};
00048   std::string sch[16]={"00","01","02","03","04","05","06","07",
00049                        "08","09","10","11","12","13","14","15"};
00050 
00051   for(unsigned tdc(0);tdc<2;tdc++) {
00052     for(unsigned ch(0);ch<8;ch++) {
00053       if(_cern) {
00054         hDist[8*tdc+ch]=new TH1F((sxy[tdc]+"Ch"+sch[ch]+"Dist").c_str(),
00055                                   (sxy[tdc]+" Ch"+sch[ch]+": Hit distribution").c_str(),
00056                                   100,500.0,1000.0);
00057         if((ch%2)==0) {
00058           hDi2d[8*tdc+ch]=new TH2F((sxy[tdc]+"Ch"+sch[ch+1]+"VsCh"+sch[ch]).c_str(),
00059                                    (sxy[tdc]+" Ch"+sch[ch+1]+" vs Ch"+sch[ch]).c_str(),
00060                                    100,500.0,1000.0,100,500.0,1000.0);
00061           hDi2p[8*tdc+ch]=new TH1F((sxy[tdc]+"Ch"+sch[ch+1]+"PlusCh"+sch[ch]).c_str(),
00062                                    (sxy[tdc]+" Ch"+sch[ch+1]+" plus Ch"+sch[ch]).c_str(),
00063                                    100,1000.0,1500.0);
00064           hDi2m[8*tdc+ch]=new TH1F((sxy[tdc]+"Ch"+sch[ch+1]+"MinusCh"+sch[ch]).c_str(),
00065                                    (sxy[tdc]+" Ch"+sch[ch+1]+" minus Ch"+sch[ch]).c_str(),
00066                                    100,-500.0,500.0);
00067         }
00068 
00069 
00070 
00071 
00072       } else {
00073         hDist[8*tdc+ch]=new TH1F((sxy[0]+"Ch"+sch[8*tdc+ch]+"Dist").c_str(),
00074                                   (sxy[0]+" Ch"+sch[8*tdc+ch]+": Hit distribution").c_str(),
00075                                   100,0.0,5000.0);
00076       }
00077     }
00078   }
00079 }
00080 
00081 void TBTrackRawCheck::Init() {
00082 }
00083 
00084 void TBTrackRawCheck::ProcessRunHeader( LCRunHeader* run) {
00085   closeHFile();
00086   openHFile(run);
00087   initHists(true);
00088 }

00090 void TBTrackRawCheck::ProcessEvent( LCEvent * evt ) {
00091 
00092 
00093   if(printLevel(3)) {
00094     std::cout << "Collections in the event" << std::endl;
00095 
00096     typedef const std::vector<std::string> StringVec ;
00097     StringVec* strVec = evt->getCollectionNames() ;
00098     
00099     for( StringVec::const_iterator name = strVec->begin() ; name != strVec->end() ; name++) {
00100       std::string sss = name->c_str();
00101       LCCollection* col = evt->getCollection(*name);
00102       int nHits =  col->getNumberOfElements() ;
00103       
00104       std::cout << "----> Evt " <<evt->getEventNumber()<< ", EXISTING COLLECTION, of the class : "
00105            << col->getTypeName().c_str() << " and named : " << sss << " with " << nHits << " elements." << std::endl;
00106     }
00107   }
00108 
00109   const LCCollection* col(0);
00110   col=getCollection(evt,_tdcRawDataCollection,LCIO::LCGENERICOBJECT);
00111   if(col!=0) {
00112     if(printLevel(2)) std::cout << "Number of elements in collection = "
00113                                 << col->getNumberOfElements() << std::endl;
00114 
00115 
00116     assert(col->getNumberOfElements()<=2);
00117     //hNCol->Fill(col->getNumberOfElements());
00118 
00119     std::vector<int> vHits[16];
00120 
00121     for(int i(0);i<col->getNumberOfElements();i++) {
00122       const LCGenericObject *q(dynamic_cast<const LCGenericObject*>(col->getElementAt(i)));
00123       assert(q!=0);
00124 
00125       BmlEventData bmlobj = col->getElementAt(i);

00127         if (printLevel(3)) std::cout <<" The channels are:" << std::endl;
00128         TDCChannelContainer_t tdcChannelConteiner = bmlobj.getTDCChannelContainer();
00129         for (TDCChannelContainer_t::iterator tdcchan_iter = tdcChannelConteiner.begin(); tdcchan_iter != tdcChannelConteiner.end(); tdcchan_iter++){
00130           if (printLevel(3)) std::cout << "TDC Channel Number: " << static_cast<unsigned int>((*tdcchan_iter).first) << std::endl;
00131           if (printLevel(3)) std::cout << "Number of measured signals: " << (*tdcchan_iter).second.size() <<std::endl;
00132           for (std::vector< std::pair<bool,int> >::iterator tdcvec_iter = (*tdcchan_iter).second.begin();  tdcvec_iter != (*tdcchan_iter).second.end(); tdcvec_iter++ ) {
00133             std::pair<bool, int> thepair = (*tdcvec_iter);
00134             int tdcindex = static_cast<unsigned int>((*tdcchan_iter).first);
00135             int index = 6*i + tdcindex;
00136             //*********************************************************************
00137             if (printLevel(3)) {
00138             std::cout << "is StartTime?: " << thepair.first << std::endl;
00139             std::cout << "Measured time: " << thepair.second << std::endl;
00140             std::cout << "Index in array:" << index << std::endl;
00141             }
00142 
00143 
00144 
00145             //edges[6*i+static_cast<unsigned int>((*tdcchan_iter).first)] = thepair.second;
00146             //*********************************************************************
00147             if (index >= 0  && index < 12 && tdcindex < 6) {
00148               //edges[6*i+static_cast<unsigned int>((*tdcchan_iter).first)]->push_back(thepair.second);
00149               //if (printLevel(3)) std::cout << "In Vector " << edges[index][0] << std::endl;
00150 
00151               if(thepair.second>0) {
00152                 hDist[8*i+static_cast<unsigned int>((*tdcchan_iter).first)]->Fill(thepair.second);
00153                 vHits[8*i+static_cast<unsigned int>((*tdcchan_iter).first)].push_back(thepair.second);
00154               }
00155             }
00156             else if (printLevel(3)) std::cout << "Out of index: not DC channel" << std::endl;
00157           }
00158         }//tdc channel iteration
00159       } //num sigchannels
00160     } //loop over elements
00161 
00162     for(unsigned i(0);i<8;i++) {
00163       for(unsigned j(0);j<vHits[2*i].size();j++) {
00164         for(unsigned k(0);k<vHits[2*i+1].size();k++) {
00165           hDi2d[2*i]->Fill(vHits[2*i][j],vHits[2*i+1][k]);
00166           hDi2p[2*i]->Fill(vHits[2*i][k]+vHits[2*i+1][j]);
00167           hDi2m[2*i]->Fill(vHits[2*i][k]-vHits[2*i+1][j]);
00168         }
00169       }
00170     }
00171

00232                 }
00233               }
00234 
00235               n++;
00236             }
00237           }
00238         }
00239       }
00240     }

00266           if(l==3) col=getCollection(evt,"TBdch02_dchSD4",LCIO::SIMTRACKERHIT);
